product_name: Pearl Izumi Elite Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Great for warm weather riding, the Pearl Izumi Elite bike jersey has the performance features to keep you cool, comfortable and spinning through the miles. Elite Transfer stretch fabric transfers moisture to the outer surface for fast evaporation; In-R-Cool technology reflects the sun to reduce fabric surface temperature. Ventilation panels help keep you cool and comfortable. Full-length front zipper lets you ventilate as needed. Droptail hem has an elasticized gripper to help hold the jersey in place. 3 back pockets stash food and other essentials; zippered sweat-proof security pocket keeps electronics protected and secure. Reflective elements help boost your visibility in low light. Formfitting cut of the Pearl Izumi Elite bike jersey helps reduce wind drag.
